title: Urgent Type ID :) !
content:

Thanxx

comments.content:
YUP! exactly.... actually I knew it was Optima because i used it before... but I couldn't remember the name....  
THANX Renko, U saved me.. :-)  
Regarding the second logo attached, I think the font is distorted!!  
Any Idea?
The second logo uses Arial Narrow. Dunno what the Arabic is.

yeh.. it worked... but distorted..:S  
THANK YOU :)
